Package actor

Class Block

java.lang.Object
actor.Actor
actor.Block
public class Block extends Actor
Represents a movable block object in the game. This class extends the Actor class, using boundaries and coordinates to represent possible moves. Blocks can interact with various elements in the game, such as water and ice tiles.

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public boolean tick(Actor.Direction direction)
      Executes a tick for the block, handling movement and interactions with game elements.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction in which to attempt to move the block.
      Returns:
      True if the block successfully moved or interacted, false otherwise.

    • setNextMove

      public Boolean setNextMove(Actor.Direction direction)
      Sets the next move for the block based on the direction and tile interactions.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction in which to move the block.
      Returns:
      True if the move is successful, false otherwise.

    • onWater

      public void onWater(tile.Tile tile)
      Handles the interaction of the block with water tiles. Converts water tiles to path tiles and removes the block.
      Parameters:
      tile - The water tile the block interacts with.
